Description: Lower section of a painted pottery shabti with a black lappet-wig with yellow braids, a red modelled face with white eyes, a yellow collar, a white body; the front of the leg section is inscribed with black paint(now illegible); joined to object reg.no 1843,0507.796 to form a single artefact.
Condition: incomplete - foot missing, cracked around knee, paint worn
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
